text:
Ananta bhai... One the most sorted, high-spirited person I've met on campus. Your approach towards life will take you places. Stay the same.

From wingi to my partner in crime, we have shared lots of golden memories together... Odyssey ke danceğŸ•º  aur OAT ki movie night  ğŸ¥   se lekar... Friday night ki mehfil ğŸ» , after-party devastation aur Terrace par bakchodi tak .. hamne sath mein bohot masti ki ğŸ˜Œ ... we explored all kinds of unorthodox stuff  together pushing each other for that last puff.. saying "bro mein tujhe sambhal lunga" ğŸ˜‚.

It was a great journey bro... hope to meet you soon for the next party and all the very best for your life ahead. Stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yo Anchal... meri civil buddy. 
Mast bandi hai tu yaar... kind hearted and honest. Stay same! ğŸ˜Š
We met properly during Techkriti par uske baad hamne sath me team treats aur pre-fest parties mein bohot masti ki. The Mill ke bahar hamara bhand photo-shoot aur Holi celebration hamesha yaad rahega. 
Late night tech-summit discussions se lekar C-bot mein ki masti tak, fest cancel hone ki BT se lekar OAT ki final walk tak.. you were a great company. ğŸ¤—
I hope to meet you soon (preferably in the campus) and I'll be always just a call away for your any kind of help. All the very best for your future, stay connected! :)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yo Monika! The girl with a great smile. 
We met for SIH (the only good thing happened in that hackathon ğŸ˜…) and it was great working with you. I will always remember our first meeting and my reaction to my friend. 
Uske baad campus mein milne ka mauka nhi mila warna we would have shared a lot more memories. 
I hope to meet you soon for the long awaited SIH treat and probably a trip to enjoy nature. :)
Till then, you keep on flexing those cool yoga poses and keep smiling like that :)
All the very best for your future, stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text: Atul bhai.. tere sath last month mein volleyball khelne mein bohot maza aaya. Tera match mein constant commentary karna was quite fun. All the best man, stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text: Hi Deepanshu, we met during the final month of college but yes we enjoyed some great volleyball matches together. You are a great person and I hope we meet in future somewhere. Till then we'll see you on your next vlog, All the best for your future man, stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Hey Dishaa!
Didn't get a chance to meet you in campus (don't know why), and share that cup of coffee which I still owe you for all those assignments. I hope our paths intersect in future and we get a chance to interact. All the best for your future! :)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Girish bhai! 
College life mein agar BHAI shabd ka asli matlab bataya jayega to hamara zikr zaroor hoga. â¤ï¸ 
1st year ke pehle din se lekar.. college life ke akhri din tak, hum hamesha sath rhe hai. Fir chahe hamari wing change ho jaye ya kuch bhi ho, hamari bonding kabhi nhi tooti. 
C610 se lekar B208 tak hamne anginat memories banai hai... 
Tere liye HEC ka poster design karne se lekar.. profs ko alag alag type ke mails draft karne tak, bahut bakchodi ki. (Wo campaigning mein seniors dwara gaand marna hamesha yaad rahega) ğŸ˜‚
The Mill mein party karna, aur tera ghoomer dance. 
B208 mein summer se lekar 3rd year tak Mini Militia mein Naksalwadi ki maarna (ğŸ˜œ) aur projector par movies dekhne se lekar har tarah ki bakchodi karna. 
Courses mein assignments/quizzes aur exams tak mein content ki adla badli karna.. ğŸ˜‚
Har samay sath bethkar cheeze planout karna aur bakchodi pelna... 
Tere logo se gussa hone par tujhe shant karana aur tere drams event mein puri wing ko kheech kar lekar aana. 
Mujhe 4 saal nashte ke liye subha uthane ke liye thank you bhai.
Harshit se sath milkar maze lene mein bahut maza aata tha yrr. Aur last mein lavesh ki faadna was ultimate! ğŸ˜‚
Subah Terrace par ghumna aur tujhe maal ke liye motivate karna. 
Teri Didi ki shaadi was ultimate fun! 
Na jane ese kitne aur kisse hai bhai sath mein.. aur aage bhi bante rahenge!
All the best for future kahu ya nhi samajh nhi aa rha kyonki tere almost har decision me to mein hamesha sath hi hota hun ğŸ˜‚. Milte hai jald hi bhai aur trip par chalte hai. Maze karo!
P.S: ek bandi se intro ki zimmedari teri bhai (tu janta hai kon ğŸ˜œ)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Gourav... mera civil ka bhai... hard-working aur sincere. Stay the same.
Tu aur mein kese mile mujhe exactly yaad nhi, par exam se pehle RR karne se lekar chill coversations share karne tak, we connected strong with time. 
Aur haan koi bhadiya investment strategy mile to batana bhai (lol).
Tera mujhse doubt puchna aur mera unn doubts ko outsource karna hamesha yaad rahega bhai. ğŸ˜‚Tere unn doubts ki wajah se meri kaaafi logo se baat shuru ho gyi ğŸ˜œ
It was a great journey with you bro, All the very best for your future life. Stay connected! :)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Krishan bhai... tujhse mulakat bahut late hui... agar pehle mile hote to bohot saare kaand sath mein kiye hote. Nevermind, mast banda hai tu bhai, hamesha aise hi haste raho aur maze karo. 
All the very best for your future life bhai, stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Nipun bhai... mast banda hai tu yaar. First year mein HEC se lekar last hookha night tak bohot memories share ki bhai. 
Galaxy, treasure hunt, warden ke sath meetings, aur bohot sare events (though mein kaafi fraud maarta tha ğŸ˜…). 
Final Jaipur trip and bhand hokar Nahargarh trek karna was awesome bhaiğŸ‘Œ. Wo khaee mein bandaro ka gherlena hamesha yaad rahega. ğŸ˜‚ Tu jese tese mujhe sambhal kar wapas le aya tha warna mein to give kar chuka tha.
Final month mein sath mein bohot volleyball kheli bhai (mast khelta tha tu).. tujhse hi art of drop seekhi mene. 
Final night ka unique experience hamesha yaad rahega bhai .. (Kaafi bakchod video banai teri).
Ese hi aur unique experiences ke liye milte hai jald hi, All the best bhai. Stay connected! ğŸ˜„
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yo Prateek bhai... Mast bande ho tum yaar.. kaafi hard-working and honest. 
First year mein tumse bohot motivation mili yaar, hamari branch change ke liye planing, tumhara courses ko lekar tension lena, hamara sath mein lectures me 1st row mein bethna (taki neend na aye :p), exams mein padhne ki startegy banana, long subject related discussions, pehli antaragni mein sath ghumna... aur bohot saari memories hai bhai sath mein. Tum mere Civil ke sabse pehle dost the and somehow kaafi strong connection ban gaya tha apna.
I hope best for your future bhai, always stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Hey Riya!
We met late (don't know why), and didn't get a chance to hangout in campus.
Somehow our conversation started and then we connected very well. Most of our convo has been over phone, phir seedha Goa mein mile aur sath ghumne ke plans banate rhe. ğŸ˜… 
I hope our paths interest in near future and we get a chance to hangout. All the best for your future, stay connected! :)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yo Shivansh bhai! 
One of the most hardworking and goal-oriented guy I met on campus.
Kaafi help ki tumne civil ke assignments mein bhai, submission se ek raat pehle tumse assignment mangne aana hamesha yaad rahega. Canteen mein parents se milwana saying ye civil ka DR-1 hai (mujhe inferiority complex de diya tha bhai ğŸ˜‚). 
All the very best for your future bhai, IAS bankar milna zaroor :). Stay connected!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Suyash bhai... The chaapu, all-rounder!
Tumse to kaafi interaction hua yaar.. NYO mein sath kaam(ğŸ˜œ) karne se lekar IME courses share karne tak. Acha connection bana gaya tha. Hope to meet you soon in future, All the best, stay connected bro! :)
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yadu bhai... mast banda hai tu yaar. First year mein HEC se lekar jaipur ghumne tak bohot memories share ki bhai. 
Galaxy mein mere fraud, treasure hunt portal par karwane ki bakchodi, warden ke sath meetings (minutes bhi tu hi banayega), aur elections ki strategy (ğŸ˜œ)... bohot sare events sath organise karwaye bhai. 
Tere sath to chaaro saal kaafi active interaction rha yaar.. bohot achi persuasive skills hai teri. 
Final Jaipur trip and bhand hokar Nahargarh trek karna was awesome bhaiğŸ‘Œ. Wo dukan wale se teri chutiyap calculation, trek mein khaee mein bandaro ka gherlena, hamesha yaad rahega bhai. ğŸ˜‚
Ese hi aur unique experiences ke liye milte rehna bhai , All the best. Stay connected bro! ğŸ˜„
P.S: Hamara Presi hamesha tu hi rahega!
author: Nimish  Agarwal

text:
Yogi bhai... mast banda hai tu yaar... funny and chilled! 
Tera odyssey wala sarcastic stand-up hamesha yaad rahega (Mauj kara di thi bhai). Fir hamara first year me WoW mein milna alag hi coincidence tha. ğŸ˜‚
Campus mein tumhare jokes, aur bakchodi yaad rahegi bhai.
Apne stand-up mein zaroor bulana. Ese hi hasate raho.. All the best for your future, stay connected bro!
author: Nimish  Agarwal
